experiences.description: Oversee design and maintenance of the OSS design system, leveraging React and front-end experience to collaborate with engineers to review, publish, and document components; Work with multiple feature teams to take projects from one-pager, through research and wireframing, to high fidelity mockups.

Managed design team to oversee production of digital projects; Designed digital products, apps, and websites informed by research and content strategy and centered around usability; Developed front-end experiences in HTML, CSS, and React.

Created user flows, design system, and individual UI mockups and screens for an end-to-end real estate sales platform; Worked directly with CTO, CEO, and engineering team to ensure usability and quality of final product.

Led web design and development projects from discovery through deployment; Wrote HTML, CSS, and PHP on multiple CMS platforms; Employed copywriting and language skills to develop site architecture, content strategies, and brand voice guidelines; Utilized outside skills such as photography, animation, and 3D modeling on special projects.

community.name: AIGA Memphis
community.role: Executive Board Member, Director of Communications
